mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Commerce
mdRecord.dcterms:title: British Freighter at Port of New Orleans, ca. 1893
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This photograph portrays an English steam ship at Port of New Orleans in New Orleans, Louisiana, ca 1893. Ship is flying the British Naval Ensign at stern. Pier is on starboard side of ship Cargo (covered) is seen on the pier, and a building is seen in the background. Overall image faded to yellowish brown with heavy marks in lower part and light marks in upper part of the photo
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: George Mason University Libraries Special Collections Research Center
